preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para: &productname; is a software platform for cloud-native application development, based on &cf;, with additional supporting services and components. The core of the platform is &scf;, a &cf; distribution for &kube; which runs on &sle; containers.
&scf; is designed to run on any Kubernetes cluster. This guide describes how to deploy it on SUSE Container as a Service (CaaS) Platform 3.0, Microsoft AKS, and Amazon EKS.
